purpose_decision: Ensure IterationStarted context refs are sufficient and derivation is deterministic.
membranes_enforced: Intent & Objective; Ontological; Accountability; Authority & Integrity
required_refs_depends_on: SR-TYPES; SR-CONTRACT; SR-SPEC; SR-DIRECTIVE; OracleSuite; Loop; (Base Candidate optional); (Active exceptions optional)
failure_conditions: Missing required refs; refs not dereferenceable; unknown governed artifact versions
stop_triggers_on_failure: EVIDENCE_MISSING (if ref cannot be fetched); ORACLE_GAP (if suite missing)
routing_portal_on_block: GovernanceChangePortal (if governance refs missing) / BudgetExtensionPortal (if blocked by budget)
notes: Keep conservative: block if unsure; escalate via portal decision.

purpose_decision: Verify all depends_on deliverables have reached Verified or Shippable status.

notes: Core gate for all code deliverables.

purpose_decision: Verify code style and lint rules pass.
Verify schemas are valid and conform to governed definitions.
Verify integration with external systems works correctly.
Verify full system e2e scenarios pass.
Verify operations produce identical outputs for identical inputs.
Verify domain core has no infrastructure dependencies.
Verify context compilation from refs is deterministic.
Verify iteration context derived only from IterationStarted.refs[].
Verify event store is strictly append-only.
Verify event replay produces identical state.
Verify staleness traverses depends_on edges correctly.
Verify evidence manifests contain required fields.
Verify evidence can be retrieved by content hash.
Verify API endpoints conform to contract.
Verify human-only endpoints reject agent/system actors.
Verify SYSTEM-only events reject human/agent actors.
Verify budget limits trigger BUDGET_EXHAUSTED correctly.

failure_conditions: Sandbox escape; network access when disabled

purpose_decision: Verify integrity conditions are correctly detected and raised.
Verify portal UI workflows complete correctly.
Verify happy path end-to-end scenario completes.
Verify state can be reconstructed from event stream.
Verify governance document is internally coherent and cross-referenced.
Verify database migrations are safe and reversible.

success_state_effect: Iteration may start for governance work

required_refs_depends_on: SR-TYPES; SR-CONTRACT; SR-SPEC; SR-DIRECTIVE; SR-PLAN; Candidate

purpose_decision: Authorize Phase 0 completion and Phase 1 start.
required_refs_depends_on: All P0 deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
failure_conditions: P0 deliverables not Verified; no approval

purpose_decision: Authorize domain core release after human review.
required_refs_depends_on: All P1 deliverable candidates; evidence bundles; architecture review
required_commitment_objects: All P1 candidates Verified; PhaseGateApproval (architecture review)
required_evidence: All P1 evidence bundles; architecture review notes

required_refs_depends_on: All P2-PERSISTENCE deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; replay determinism proof

required_refs_depends_on: All P2-EVIDENCE deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; content addressing proof

required_refs_depends_on: All P3 deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; API contract report; actor kind audit

required_refs_depends_on: All P4-ORCH deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; SYSTEM-only proof; budget enforcement proof

required_refs_depends_on: All P4-ORACLE deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; determinism proof; integrity detection proof

required_refs_depends_on: All P5-UI deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; portal workflow proof

required_refs_depends_on: All P5-OPS deliverable candidates; evidence bundles
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; self-host boot proof

required_refs_depends_on: All P6 deliverable candidates; evidence bundles

purpose_decision: Authorize final release with replayability demonstration.
required_refs_depends_on: All deliverable candidates; all evidence bundles; replayability demonstration
required_evidence: All evidence bundles; full replayability proof
